quotes.quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don't have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He suffers more than necessary, who suffers before it is necessary.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The wise man is content with his lot, whatever it may be, without wishing for what he has not.
quotes.author: Seneca
